data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Skating is a great way to get exercise in the winter. In ____ center ____ town ____ is a park ____ a ____ that ____ in December. You ____ rent a pair ____ skates ____ the ____ store ____. At Christmastime, everyone in town comes out and skates on the ice.
data.partBlankContent: Skating is a great way to get exercise in the winter. In t__ center o_ town th___ is a park wi__ a la__ that fre____ in December. You c__ rent a pair o_ skates fr__ the spo___ store nea___. At Christmastime, everyone in town comes out and skates on the ice.
data.answer: 滑冰是冬天锻炼身体的好方法。在镇中心有一个公园，公园里的湖在12月结冰。你可以在附近的运动用品店租一双溜冰鞋。在圣诞节期间，镇上的每个人都出来在冰上滑冰。
